title: Jodie Sweetin
description:
Jodie Sweetin worked at a drug treatment facility between “Full House” and “Fuller House,” and recounts how her own battle with addiction led her down the path to helping others. She details her story as a rebellious teen struggling with fame and “normal life” all under the watchful eye of the media, and how that led to her issues with drugs and alcohol. Jodie also talks about the “Fuller House” reunion, and what that was like to reunite with a cast that’s stayed friends for 35 years. She shares stories from the set, and especially the bittersweet, last day of filming for “Fuller House’s” final season. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
